body:
Configuration file

To change the benchmarks to run please press the configure button (red in figure) and choose a config file in JSon format.

The configure file should follow the format as the figure below,

among which name, category, checked, runCmd, time(estimated time to finish running the specified program) must be included.

Customize running programs

To customize the running programs please specified (only) the argument values in the command line dialog.

Please notice that the path to run the program is not required to be specified in the command line.

To find information about options available for this program please press the button next to the reset button. It will expand a doc dialog.

After that press the save button before running. But notive this will not change the default settings the next time the program starts
